item.title: Call for admissions to Collegio di Milano - a. y. 2024-2025
University scholarships definitive ranking a.y. 2023/2024:
item.description: The definitive ranking has been published a.y. 2023/2024: University scholarships - Students enrolled in the first year of a master's degree programme. The outcome is available in your helpdesk, under "Right to study, grants, accommodation and catering" > if you want to access the details of the rankings published in the last two academic year.%0A

item.title: Study awards (type A-B-C) in memory of Professor Clementina Gatti. a.y. 2023/2024
item.description: For the academic year 2023/2024, the University is giving out three study awards (type A-B-C) in memory of Professor Clementina Gatti.%0AFor further information, check out the calls for applications on the dedicated pages.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
